sentences.sContent: When they conquered Britain, the Romans brought this custom with them.
sentences.sCn: 当古罗马人征服不列颠时，他们把这一习俗也带了过去。

sentences.sContent: ...But chariots maintained their place in parades and triumphs right up until the end of the Roman Empire 1...

phrases.pCn: 罗马帝国（指公元前27年到公元476年的罗马奴隶制国家）
罗马天主教的；天主教会的；天主教徒
罗马天主教会；罗马公教

trans.tranOther: A Roman was a citizen of ancient Rome or its empire
relating to ancient Rome or the Roman Empire
